sub_features.name: Native Tracing
sub_features.notes: Complete capture of LLM inputs, outputs, code, and parameters via Weave SDK.

sub_features.name: Trace Tree Display
sub_features.notes: Hierarchical parent-child visualization with trace tree enhancements for workflow visibility.

sub_features.name: Stream Tracing
sub_features.notes: SDK supports tracing completions, though explicit UI rendering behaviors for live token streaming are basic.

sub_features.name: Multimodal Logging
sub_features.notes: Native tracing and UI rendering of non-text inputs/outputs including images, audio, and video.

sub_features.name: @weave.op() Decorator
sub_features.notes: Single decorator for automatic trace collection of LLM library requests (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.).

sub_features.name: Custom Metadata Logging
sub_features.notes: Tracks custom attributes alongside traces, with robust platform-wide search and filtering abilities.

sub_features.name: Token & Cost Tracking
sub_features.notes: Accurate per-tokenizer prompt/output token counting and integrated cost estimation.

sub_features.name: OTel Trace Endpoint
sub_features.notes: Provides an OpenTelemetry-compatible endpoint allowing ingestion of standard OTel traces.

sub_features.name: Function Call Trace Views
sub_features.notes: Parsed structural display of requested tool/function call parameters and returned execution values.

sub_features.name: Deep Trace Viewer
sub_features.notes: Provides execution visibility through multi-step nested tree views, though lacks a dedicated visual node-based DAG view for agents.

sub_features.name: Intermediate Reasoning Capture
sub_features.notes: Records step-by-step logic and Chain-of-Thought states in agent operations.

sub_features.name: Error Tracking Node
sub_features.notes: Renders exceptions within the trace execution tree.

sub_features.name: Model Context Protocol Support
sub_features.notes: Explicit tracing for MCP client/server interfaces including tool calls, prompt generation, and resource access.

sub_features.name: LLM Judge Builder
sub_features.notes: GUI-driven workflow (added Dec 2024) for rapidly configuring and deploying LLM evaluators.

sub_features.name: Code-based Scoring Functions
sub_features.notes: Allows completely custom imperative evaluation functions defined in code (TypeScript support expected soon).

sub_features.name: Weave Datasets
sub_features.notes: High-performance versioned dataset storage, generation, and test-case payload mapping for evaluation workflows.

sub_features.name: Automated Drift Monitoring
sub_features.notes: Monitors output regressions and model accuracy shifts during automated offline execution streams.

sub_features.name: Experiment Grid Views
sub_features.notes: Side-by-side juxtaposition of LLM configurations, prompt versions, and their corresponding evaluation output distributions.

sub_features.name: Trace Comparison Summaries
sub_features.notes: Summarized trace comparison view condensing aggregated tool usage, scores, call counts, tokens, and costs across multiple traces into single columns.

sub_features.name: Human Feedback Forms
sub_features.notes: Provides customizable human annotation rating interfaces, but lacks specific workforce queue management mapping or reviewer task assignment systems.

sub_features.name: Online Evaluators
sub_features.notes: Runs scheduled offline inferences or background LLM judges simultaneously on subsets (random sampling/filtering) of real-time production traffic.

sub_features.name: Sensitive Data Protection
sub_features.notes: Local SDK-level redaction using Microsoft Presidio (`redact_pii=True`) to completely mask emails, credit cards, or specified internal variable keys before transmission.

sub_features.name: Pre-built Scorers
sub_features.notes: Plug-and-play LLM scorers directly optimized for hallucination mitigation and factuality checks.

sub_features.name: Off-topic & Toxicity Blocks
sub_features.notes: Configurable safety checks intercepting jailbreak attempts, toxic content, and off-topic outputs.

sub_features.name: Programmatic Guardrules
sub_features.notes: Direct definition of guardrails enforcing safety bounds within application architecture dynamically.

sub_features.name: Unified Cost Center
sub_features.notes: Cumulative usage tracking automatically converting mapped inputs to organizational cost impacts across runs.

sub_features.name: Token Dashboards
sub_features.notes: Historical metric visualization differentiating request vs. response tokens, caches, and overhead usage dimensions.

sub_features.name: Basic Performance Charts
sub_features.notes: Systematically logs latency alongside basic trendlines; distinct percentile heatmap analysis (P90/P99) behavior is manual via platform plots.

sub_features.name: Trace Analytics Overview
sub_features.notes: Project overview dashboard displays latency percentiles (P50/P95/P99), request counts, and token usage, with clickable time buckets linking straight to related traces.

sub_features.name: Real-Time Observability
sub_features.notes: Visual identification and aggregation of faulting inferences dynamically streaming from systems.

sub_features.name: W&B Custom Visualization
sub_features.notes: Rich workspace capability to emit isolated performance counters or score results to customizable reporting views.

sub_features.name: Weave Prompts Repository
sub_features.notes: First-class abstraction for versioning user instructions programmably synced with a visual management section.

sub_features.name: Evaluations & Prompt Playground
sub_features.notes: Integrated dashboard environments allowing interactive real-time adjustment of context, systems, or parameters during prompt creation.

sub_features.name: W&B Experiments
sub_features.notes: Extensive heritage capability grouping configuration branches systematically for historical benchmarking against metric thresholds.

sub_features.name: W&B Models Sync
sub_features.notes: Enables fluid trace data pipelining outward to internal Weights and Biases LLM tuning capabilities orchestrating production model adjustments.

sub_features.name: Artifact Registry
sub_features.notes: Robust lineage management using specific alias tracking (`@latest`, `@v1`) capable of referencing earlier prompt/model deployment points.

sub_features.name: Native Application Libraries
sub_features.notes: Comprehensive official implementation in Python and current active expansion in TypeScript. Go is not currently offered.

sub_features.name: Ecosystem Integrations
sub_features.notes: Direct instrumentation hooking into typical framework stacks out of box (e.g., LangChain, LlamaIndex, OpenAI standard libraries).

sub_features.name: W&B Service Interfacing
sub_features.notes: Enterprise programmable data transmission points interacting deeply with platform system operations and external workflows.

sub_features.name: Automated Workflows
sub_features.notes: Can execute evaluations and gate conditions inside delivery paths via Registry-triggered updates or actions.

sub_features.name: W&B Hosting Variants
sub_features.notes: Highly adaptable infrastructure footprint encompassing generic Multi-tenant cloud, managed sole instance Dedicated clusters (AWS/GCP/Azure), and Self-managed deployments.

sub_features.name: Weave Github Repo
sub_features.notes: Mainline Weave tracking libraries remain comprehensively open-source with extensive community backing.

sub_features.name: Enterprise Security Program
sub_features.notes: Confirmed validation paths covering SOC 2 Type II, structured GDPR Data Processing, and rigid HIPAA 6-year retention guidelines via regional isolation controls.

sub_features.name: W&B Identity Management
sub_features.notes: Rich capability supporting hierarchical domain partitioning (Org/Team/Projs) via Custom or standard Admin/Member roles synchronized deeply using standard SSO/SAML brokers (Auth0).

sub_features.name: System Audit Schema
sub_features.notes: Inflexible recording mechanisms exposing IP, actor, actions, reporting digests natively or through automated BYOB bucketing (with PII obfuscation tools).

sub_features.name: Secure Storage Linkages
sub_features.notes: Customer storage configurations capable of mirroring system exports safely outward toward Pandas, Snowflake, BigQuery, or Amazon Redshift.
